00055   // class CShape
00091   template <typename TShape>
00092   struct CShape
00093   {
00094     // ----------------------- Concept checks ------------------------------
00095   public:
00096     
00097     typedef typename TShape::Space::Point Point;
00098     typedef typename TShape::Space Space;
00099     
00100     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT((CSpace<Space>));
00101 
00102  
00103     BOOST_CONCEPT_USAGE( CShape )
00104     {
00105       // Shape should have a getUpperBound() returning a Point.
00106       ConceptUtils::sameType( myP, myT.getUpperBound() );
00107       // Shape should have a getLowerBound() returning a Point.
00108       ConceptUtils::sameType( myP, myT.getLowerBound() );
00109       // Shape should have a operator() returning a double.
00110       //    ConceptUtils::sameType( aDouble, myT(myP) );
00111       // Shape should have an isInside() function returning a bool.
00112       ConceptUtils::sameType( aBool, myT.isInside(myP) );
00113       
00114     }
00115 
00116     // ------------------------- Private Datas --------------------------------
00117   private:
00118     TShape myT;
00119     Point myP;
00120     bool aBool;
00121     double aDouble;
00122     
00123   }; // end of concept CShape
